metadata.name: Panda Rainbow
metadata.description:
Panda knows that rainbows are made of love. 

This 2D animation was completely hand drawn frame by frame in Callipeg with original music composed to accompany it. Over 110 hours of dedication and passion went into the creation of this first piece in the “Pandamation” collection.

213 layered frames. 24 fps. Endless hearts.
